item.title: Large tree requires pruning and Japanese knotweed present growing on overhanging branches and vines needs treatment urgently., 7th August
item.description:
Large tree has not been maintained by council, branches are overhanging with vines overhanging over property no 23 back garden. Japanese knotweed weed present and visible on branches up and around the tree,surrounding areas and has caused fence panels to crack. It is imperative this invasive knotweed is treated effectively and promptly to avoid spreading through no 23 garden and nearing parameters. This has been an ongoing issue which has not been dealt with urgency or priority posing vast potential damages to property no 23 foundations and infrastructure and nearing neighbours. Please can this be reviewed with urgency and may we request regular updates informing us of treatment plan in place and when it will be carried out. A confirmation of each treatment implemented will be appreciated. Thankyou

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haydens Close, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
